mapper.insert: insert into news (nid, title, shorttitle, overview, context, type, position, state, sort, createdate, editdate, count, eid) values (#{nid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shorttitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=TEXT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update news
